channel.title: perm count?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "perm count?" - what is it good for.

item.title: Re: perm count?
item.content:encoded:
well note that i count a total of 730 awesome on the wiki. however i know Lafiel has 770 awesome. meaning that the wiki isn't complete. and some players like Lafiel don't modify the wiki to help others. Lafiel who is top player (#1) has 247 perms, 770 awesome, and is season 60 as of billy dayroll on 04-22-2010.

I know that the Rising Sun trophy isn't listed. (20 awesome is what i heard) then that would mean 20 awesome is missing from here. i don't know where the extra 20 is, but it wouldn't surprise me if it was something along the lines of summon a lv.3 enraged WorldKaiju and defeat it.

item.title: Re: perm count?
item.content:encoded: Perm count is a tie-breaker when determining rankings. I suppose it's conceivable that McM could add a quest or something similar that requires you to have a 200+ Perm Count, but if he has no one's found it yet.

item.title: perm count?
item.content:encoded:
there are several perms out there that don't count towards perm count. then there's items that add more like snugly teddy bear or the seasons collections.

is there any benefit to a higher perm count or is it just for bragging?
